As a skilled corporate strategist and natural problem solver, I can overcome obstacles by designing practical solutions. My specialist knowledge of the end-to-end procurement (Direct & Indirect) and Supply Chain life cycle allows me to maintain a “big picture” view of the business using strong commercial acumen. I have practical experience delivering and implementing ERP solutions such as Oracle R-12 with multiple modules. 
My collaborative communication skills and tireless work ethic makes me an ideal addition to any company seeking to expand its operations.

profile_positions.title: Head of Procurement & Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description:
In this position, I collaborated with a variety of colleagues to overhaul procurement and supply chain management policies in line with international standards of best practice. I designed processes and procedures to ensure consistency and efficiency across all SCM operations and used KPI’s and other metrics to track and evaluate performance. I led several key planning and governance work streams using a combination of strong technical knowledge and people management skills. I concurrently spearheaded the support services function focused on the numbers management, vouchers management, Imsi Management and Numbers and Sims planning. Also Headed the Warehousing & Logistics function to and smoothly run the operations. Some key achievements included:

•	Established an end-to-end vendor management function including performance evaluation, relationship management, and complaint handling workflows.
•	Successfully managed a warehouse facility with over 380k sq. ft. of technical, administrative, and trade inventories.
•	Orchestrated the successful consolidation of 19 warehouses into five across three cities leading to a 30% reduction in costs and 70% in HR requirements.
•	Implemented an innovative program to reduce the commercial buffer stock level from 90 days to 30 days.
•	Implemented an automated asset tracking system from warehouse to sites maintaining strict control over the movement and visibility of assets in a highly complex supply chain.
•	Ensured that commercial stock availability consistently met monthly targets without fail to facilitate the achievement of commercial sales targets.
•	Developed Procurement & Supply Chain process and procedures manual as a guideline to follow by all stake holders.
•	Handled the end to end Sourcing & contract management of Indirect categories.
•	Developed different reports for Procurement KPIs, Sox, category management Performance and supply chain KPIs.
